Package com.intellij.uiDesigner.core

Class GridLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.uiDesigner.core.AbstractLayout
      • com.intellij.uiDesigner.core.GridLayoutManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.awt.LayoutManager2

    public final class GridLayoutManager
extends AbstractLayout

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Object DESIGN_TIME_INSETS
      Key for accessing client property which is set on the root Swing component of the design-time component hierarchy and specifies the value of extra insets added to all components.

      • Fields inherited from class com.intellij.uiDesigner.core.AbstractLayout

        public int getRowStretch(int rowIndex)
        Returns:
        vertical stretch for the row with specified index. The returned values is in range [1..Integer.MAX_VALUE].

      • setRowStretch

                          int stretch)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if stretch is less then 1.

      • getColumnStretch
